name: Merida (Brave) Disney Princess, by YeiyeiArt
description:
Merida is a well-known Disney princess. To create the Lora, a meticulously selected and refined DataSet was used to achieve a versatile and flexible model. So that it adapts perfectly to styles and models. It also works in 3D. Use the keyword “(MeridaWaifu:1)” for greater precision, and I also recommend using the keywords “(dress)” to invoke her characteristic outfit. If you want to change her outfit, I recommend lowering the weight of the Lora between “0.8 - 0.5” for greater flexibility, try it out and have fun. Remember to leave a Review with an image if you liked it and comment!! HAVE FUN :D

Don’t forget to check out my other Disney Series Loras on my profile. Currently Rapunzel, Snow White, Merida, Cinderella, Pocahontas, Fa Mulan, Elsa, Anna, Tiana and Alice in Wonderland, Ariel!! From the Princess Series ;D” Also u have The Bonus Series with: Nani Pelekai, Lifeguard (lilo & stitch). And Tinker bell, Jane Porter (Tarzan),
